basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A. in Management Information Systems at the Shilder College of Business at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

highlights: Ensuring students' safety, well-being and that they attend their afternoon classes and leave school in a timely manner throughout the afternoon.
Providing help on students' homework when requested.
Responsible for handling reception, phone operator, and keeping the office clean.
I was also tasked with coordinating student led activities and events including coaching the school's E-Sports Team to the playoffs in each season of competition.
I also helped tutor students who were in need of extra help with their learning.

volunteer.position: Tennis Boys & Girls D1 Assistant Coach
highlights: Coaching and instructing tennis to students at the intermediate, junior varsity, and varsity levels.
Our teams play competitively with other schools in the ILH with select students going on to play in the yearly state tournament.
